ExternalData.Titlesect: Convention for the Suppression of the Illicit Traffic in Dangerous Drugs
ExternalData.Conclusion: Geneva, 26 June 1936, and Lake Success, New York, 11 December 1946<superscript>1</superscript>

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 10 October 1947, the date on which the amendments to the Convention, as set forth in the annex to the Protocol of 11 December 1946, entered into force, in accordance with paragraph 2 of article VII of the Protocol.

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: League of Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 198, p. 301.
